paragraphs.content: Hear my prayer, O LORD, give ear to my supplications: in thy faithfulness answer me, and in thy righteousness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Hear my prayer, O Lord, give ear to my supplications: in thy faithfulness answer me, and in thy righteousness.

paragraphs.content: And enter not into judgment with thy servant: for in thy sight shall no man living be justified.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And enter not into judgment with thy servant: for in thy sight shall no man living be justified.

paragraphs.content: For the enemy hath persecuted my soul; he hath smitten my life down to the ground; he hath made me to dwell in darkness, as those that have been long dead.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For the enemy hath persecuted my soul; he hath smitten my life down to the ground; he hath made me to dwell in darkness, as those that have been long dead.

paragraphs.content: Therefore is my spirit overwhelmed within me; my heart within me is desolate.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Therefore is my spirit overwhelmed within me; my heart within me is desolate.

paragraphs.content: I remember the days of old; I meditate on all thy works; I muse on the work of thy hands.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I remember the days of old; I meditate on all thy works; I muse on the work of thy hands.

paragraphs.content: I stretch forth my hands unto thee: my soul thirsteth after thee, as a thirsty land. Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I stretch forth my hands unto thee: my soul thirsteth after thee, as a thirsty land. Selah.

paragraphs.content: Hear me speedily, O LORD: my spirit faileth: hide not thy face from me, lest I be like unto them that go down into the pit.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Hear me speedily, O Lord: my spirit faileth: hide not thy face from me, lest I be like unto them that go down into the pit.

paragraphs.content: Cause me to hear thy lovingkindness in the morning; for in thee do I trust: cause me to know the way wherein I should walk; for I lift up my soul unto thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Cause me to hear thy lovingkindness in the morning; for in thee do I trust: cause me to know the way wherein I should walk; for I lift up my soul unto thee.

paragraphs.content: Deliver me, O LORD, from mine enemies: I flee unto thee to hide me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Deliver me, O Lord, from mine enemies: I flee unto thee to hide me.

paragraphs.content: Teach me to do thy will; for thou art my God: thy spirit is good; lead me into the land of uprightness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Teach me to do thy will; for thou art my God: thy spirit is good; lead me into the land of uprightness.

paragraphs.content: Quicken me, O LORD, for thy name’s sake: for thy righteousness’ sake bring my soul out of trouble.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Quicken me, O Lord, for thy name’s sake: for thy righteousness’ sake bring my soul out of trouble.

paragraphs.content: And of thy mercy cut off mine enemies, and destroy all them that afflict my soul: for I am thy servant.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And of thy mercy cut off mine enemies, and destroy all them that afflict my soul: for I am thy servant.
